mapper.select: SELECT /* [CommentService.selectComment] 코멘트 조회 */ COMMENT_ID AS commentId , COMMENT AS comment , ETC AS etc , REG_ID AS regId , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM HMP_USER WHERE USER_ID = C.REG_ID) AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS regDtm FROM HMP_BBS_COMMENT C WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
